info.title: IHG Staging API
info.description: Test our services using the API elements below. Select your API and your Key from the drop down menus, then use the methods listed to return sample API information within each available category.

externalDocs.description: View our Written Documentation to begin the process of integrating our APIs with your site(s).

tags.name: Hotel Availability Request with Rate Rules

get.summary: The Hotel Search Request can be used to perform ho...
get.description: The Hotel Search Request can be used to perform hotel searches by specific Brand code(s) and/or Region

parameters.name: LastModifyTime
parameters.description: Timestamp of last modified time of database.

parameters.name: brandcodes
parameters.description: Two character code that identifies what hotel brand group property belongs to. Up to 8 codes, separated by comma

parameters.name: regioncodes
parameters.description: The ISO Code for the Region

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: The output format

get.summary: The Hotel Search Request should be used to perform...
get.description: The Hotel Search Request should be used to perform hotel searches around airports.

parameters.name: AirportCode
parameters.description: The airport code.

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Length of the radius from the target location.

parameters.name: HotelAmenityCode
parameters.description: Refers to the OTA Code List Hotel Amenity Code (provide 0 to 10 values, comma delimited with no spaces - 68,22,12).

parameters.name: RoomAmenityCode
parameters.description: Identifies the time of room amenities offered (provide 0 to 5 values, comma delimited with no spaces - 13,7.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: The output format

get.summary: The Hotel Search Request can be used to perform ho...
get.description: The Hotel Search Request can be used to perform hotel searches around cities.

parameters.name: CityName
parameters.description: The name of the city.

parameters.name: StateCode
parameters.description: The standard code or abbreviation for the state, province, or region.

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The ISO Region code for this region.

parameters.name: HotelAmenityCode
parameters.description: Refers to the OTA Code List Hotel Amenity Code (provide 0 to 10 values, comma delimited with no spaces - 68,22,12).

parameters.name: RoomAmenityCode
parameters.description: Identifies the time of room amenities offered (provide 0 to 5 values, comma delimited with no spaces - 13,7.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: The output format

get.summary: The Hotel Search Request can be used to perform ho...
get.description: The Hotel Search Request can be used to perform hotel searches within longitude and latitude coordinates

parameters.name: Longitude
parameters.description: The positional coordinates for longitude.

parameters.name: Latitude
parameters.description: The positional coordinates for latitude.

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: The radius in miles from the geographical coordinates.

parameters.name: HotelAmenityCode
parameters.description: Refers to the OTA Code List Hotel Amenity Code (provide 0 to 10 values, comma delimited with no spaces - 68,22,12).

parameters.name: RoomAmenityCode
parameters.description: Identifies the time of room amenities offered (provide 0 to 5 values, comma delimited with no spaces - 13,7.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: The output format

get.summary: Rate Range provides the requested rate or rate ran...
get.description: Rate Range provides the requested rate or rate range.

parameters.name: Start
parameters.description: The start date of the desired stay.  The format is year-month-day (2013-12-01)

parameters.name: End
parameters.description: The end date of the desired stay.  The format is year-month-day (2013-12-05)

parameters.name: NonSmoking
parameters.description: The value of true would mean non-smoking rooms only.  The value of false would mean no preference.

parameters.name: AdultCount
parameters.description: The number of adults in the room.

parameters.name: ChildCount
parameters.description: The number of children in the room.

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: The number of rooms.

parameters.name: CityName
parameters.description: The city you want rates for.

parameters.name: StateCode
parameters.description: The 2-character state you want rates for.

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The 2-character country you want rates for.

parameters.name: PCRNumber
parameters.description: The 9-character PCR Number, if applicable.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: The output format

get.summary: Hotel Descriptive Info provides detailed informati...
get.description: Hotel Descriptive Info provides detailed information about a specific hotel.

parameters.name: HotelCode
parameters.description: The specific property ID that you're requesting more information from.

parameters.name: PrimaryLangID
parameters.description: Requesting the Hotel Descriptive Content Info in various languages.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: The output format

get.summary: Hotel Availability will return the rules associate...
get.description: Hotel Availability will return the rules associated to the rates returned. These rules may include tax, cancellation policy, commission policy, guarantee requirements, etc.

parameters.name: HotelCode
parameters.description: This element is used to specify the property id for which the hotel availability request. The code uniquely identifies a single hotel property. Up to 8 hotel codes are supported within a single call. When providing multiple hotels, provide a comma-delimited list. Ex: BELCA,ATLCP,RWCCA

parameters.name: Start
parameters.description: The start date of the desired stay.  The format is year-month-day (2013-12-01).

parameters.name: End
parameters.description: The end date of the desired stay.  The format is year-month-day (2013-12-05).

parameters.name: RatePlanCode
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value for the rate plan being searched. (provide 0 to 3 values, comma delimited with no spaces - IGCOR,IGBBB).

parameters.name: NonSmoking
parameters.description: The value of true would mean non-smoking rooms only.  The value of false would mean no preference.  Defaults to false.

parameters.name: AdultCount
parameters.description: The number of adults in the room.

parameters.name: ChildCount
parameters.description: The number of children in the room.

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: The number of rooms.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: The output format

get.summary: Hotel Availability will return the rules associate...
get.description: Hotel Availability will return the rules associated to the rates returned. These rules include tax, cancellation policy, commission policy, guarantee requirements, etc.
tags: Hotel Availability Request with Rate Rules

parameters.name: HotelCode
parameters.description: This element is used to specify the property id for which the hotel availability request. The code uniquely identifies a single hotel property. Up to 8 hotel codes are supported within a single call. When providing multiple hotels, provide a comma-delimited list. Ex: BELCA,ATLCP,RWCCA

parameters.name: Start
parameters.description: The start date of the desired stay.  The format is year-month-day (2013-12-01).

parameters.name: End
parameters.description: The end date of the desired stay.  The format is year-month-day (2013-12-05).

parameters.name: NonSmoking
parameters.description: The value of true would mean non-smoking rooms only.  The value of false would mean no preference.  Defaults to false.

parameters.name: AdultCount
parameters.description: The number of adults in the room.

parameters.name: ChildCount
parameters.description: The number of children in the room.

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: The number of rooms.

parameters.name: PCRNumber
parameters.description: The 9-character PCR Number, if applicable.

parameters.name: LanguageLink
parameters.description: The requested language code.
